---
title: "Gift Giving"
description: |
  Analysis of Gift Spending by gender
author: Henok Dawite
date: February 19, 2025
format: html
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(ggplot2))
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))


gifts_gender <- read.csv("gifts_gender.csv")


ggplot() +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "Candy", y = Candy, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "Flowers", y = Flowers, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "Jewelry", y = Jewelry, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "GreetingCards", y = GreetingCards, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "EveningOut", y = EveningOut, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "Clothing", y = Clothing, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  geom_bar(data = gifts_gender, aes(x = "GiftCards", y = GiftCards, fill = Gender), stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Gift Spending by Gender", 
       x = "Gift Category", 
       y = "Percentage of People Buying") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
